Detailed Description

Contains all polynomial coefficients for all selected degrees of freedom.

The class contains a set of piecewise polynomials for position velocity, and acceleration progressions of all selected degrees of freedom. It contains a 2D array of RMLPolynomial objects that contain the coefficients of the actual polynomials.

See also:
RMLPolynomial
RMLOutputParameters
Example 2 — Making Use of Output Parameters of the Position-based algorithm

Member Data Documentation

RMLPolynomial ** RMLOutputPolynomials::Coefficients

Pointer to a 2D array of RMLPolynomial objects.

This heap-allocated two-dimensional array contains all coefficients of all polynomial segments for all degrees of freedom. A trajectory for one single degree of freedom may consist of up to 14 polynomial segments. The coefficients of a single polynomial can be accessed by RMLPolynomial::Coefficients[k][l], where k is the index of a degree of freedom and l is the index of a polynomial segment .

See also:
RMLPolynomial
int* RMLOutputPolynomials::NumberOfCurrentlyValidSegments
int RMLOutputPolynomials::NumberOfDOFs

The number of degrees of freedom .

Pointer to an array of integer numbers with RMLOutputPolynomials::NumberOfDOFs elements that contain the number of valid polynomial segments per degree of freedom .
